item.description:
Embrace Wellness—starting here and now.

Anytime is a good time to start embracing a healthy lifestyle. Plus Size Yoga Meetup is a 90-minute yoga workshop offering full figured women a judgment free space to embrace and support each other in a healthy lifestyle. It is more than a yoga class. Class is taught by Annika Nilsson Ripps, RYT.

Learn to use yoga and yogic principles to guide you to a vibrant life full of energy, freedom, and peace. This is a friendly, welcoming, and safe environment to explore yoga, nutrition, and topics that are specific to the lives and concerns of full figured women and women in general.

Join us to recharge and refocus so that you can have the vitality and joyful life you want—starting here and now.

Next Meetup Time: Friday, May 7th, 7:00pm – 8:30pm

Location: Absolute Yoga, 77 West Main St. 2nd floor. Hopkinton, MA (near 495)

Cost: $15 for Plus Size Yoga Meetup Members.

Update: Next weekly Plus Size Yoga class (Sundays, 5pm) begins Sunday, May 16th, (6 weeks, no class 5/30) $90. More details at www.AbsoluteYoga.net

group.name: Plus Size Yoga Meetup for Women

item.name: Plus Size Yoga for Women (May meetup)
